Author: lameanonymous
Text: It’s okay, I feel the same way. Like before I could go so long without eating and exercising a lot, but now, I’ll let myself usually eat whatever as long as I don’t feel too horrible about myself and skip exercise. It’s really done a toll because it’s like did I really struggle if it’s so easy for me to eat and skip exercise now? WHY is it so easy?   I hope you do better soon, please don’t think you’re weak for not being able to revert to those habits! Those habits aren’t good in the long run, I know it’s hard but we have to try!
